server.validation: There was a problem with your request. Please check the errors provided.
server.status_201: Request successfully received and resource was created.
server.status_202: Request successfully received and is being processed.
server.status_204: Request successfully received and has no response.
server.status_406: The requested content cannot be provided in the requested content type.
server.status_429: Too many requests, you are being rate limited.
server.status_451: Requested content is being censored or legal reason.
server.status_502: Server is too busy to handle your request.
